```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
Mobula_occurrence<-read.csv("Data/gbif_manta_ray_simple.csv", sep = "\t") %>% 
  clean_names()
Mobula_occurrence
```
```{r}
Mobula_selected <- Mobula_occurrence %>% 
  select("decimal_latitude", "decimal_longitude", "basis_of_record") #basisOfRecord has 4 different types of observations(Human, Preserved Specimen, Machine): can include this in methods
```

```{r}
write_csv(Mobula_selected, file = here("data", "manta.csv")) #how to export datasets into csv files
```
